lines.text: SHUT UP!
Shut u-up? Why certainly! You don't think I'm the type that would keep on blabbin'? Some people never know when to stop. When I'm told to shut up, I shut up...

[sticks gun in Bugs's face]
Shut UP shut-in' up!
Stop right there, rabbit! How much do you know?
Who, me? Oh, I know uh lotsa things! Two and two is four, Carson City is the capital of Nevada, uh, George Washington was the first president...
CUT IT! This guy knows too much, Mugsy.
[Bugs makes sounds like a police car stopping]

[Irish accent]
All right, Clancey, take the boys and surround the house.
[Runs through the door]
Jiggers, the cops!
Hide me! Quick, hide me!
Here. hide in here, quick.
[Puts Rocky inside the stove]
Hide me too! Hide me! Wah-hah-hah! It's not fair! You've gotta hide me, too!
I must be dreaming. It couldn't be this easy. Okay, quick. Hide in here.
[Hides Mugsy in stove]
Now don't move until I tell you too.

[Knocking on door]
All right, open up! This is the police!
[Forces door open]
All right, where's Rocky? Where's he hiding?

[Normal]
He's not in this stove.

[as policeman]
Oho! He's hiding in the stove, eh?
Now look, would I turn on this gas if my friend Rocky was in there?

[as policeman]
Um, you might, rabbit. You might.
Well, would I throw a lighed match in there if my friend was in there?
[Throws match in stove; it explodes]

[as policeman]
All right, rabbit, you've convinced me. I'll look for Rocky in the city.
[Closes door]
The coast is clear, fellas. They've gone.
[Rocky and Mugsy come out of the oven, all burned and groggy; just then the real police arrives]
Okay, Clancey. Take the boys and surround the house.
Jiggers, fellas! The cops!
[Rocky and Mugsy hide back in the oven]

[Knocking on door]
Open up! This is the police!
[Bursts through door ]
All right, Rabbit. Where's Rocky? Where's he hiding?
He's not in this stove.
Oho! He's hiding in the stove, eh?
Would I turn on this gas if he was in there?
Um, you might, rabbit. You might.
Well, would I throw a lighed match in there if he was in there?
Oh no, you don't!
[He and Mugsy burst out of stove and grovel at the policeman's feet]
Take me with you! Don't leave me with that crazy rabbit! I confess! I did it! Arrest me! Arrest me!
Shut up!
What'd I do, boss?
I said button yer lip.
Oh, okay, boss.
[Literally buttons up his lip]

[Muffled]
How's this, boss?
Mugsy take this rabbit into the other room and let him have it.
Duh, okay boss
[laughs]
Alright Mugsy let me have it!, come, come you hoid what the boss said let me have it!
Oh uh, okay but duh
[Gives him his gun]
That's better
[shoots Mugsy in the face]
Duh, I let him have it boss just like you said
[Passes out and lands on top of Rocky]
Get off!
[punches him]
I guess I'll have to take care of that rabbit myself.

[Bugs tells Mugsy to pull into a gas station. As they stop, Bugs gets out of the car, borrows a nickel and walks into a telephone box]
Hello, police department? I've got the bank robbers, we're on Highway 55, headin' west.
[Mugsy quickly grabs Bugs and drags him back to the car, before driving off]
We're driving a '52 Acme, straight eight! Overhead valves, WITH CALIFORNIA LICENSE PLATES!

[Now a private investigator. Answering the phone in his office]
Bugs Bunny Private Eyeball - Thugs thwarted, arsonists arrested, bandits booked, forgers found and chiselers chiseled!
